mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT a.*, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_time , '%Y-%m-%d') AS get_time FROM ( SELECT t1.id , t1.`name` , t1.image1 , t1.image2 , t2.`name` AS category , ( SELECT group_concat(e.`name` SEPARATOR ';') FROM t_achievement e , t_achievement_relation f WHERE e.id = f.achievement_id AND e.type = 1 AND f.relation_id = t1.id GROUP BY f.relation_id ) AS achievement FROM t_product t1 , t_category t2 WHERE t1.is_badge = 1 AND t1.badge_category3 = t2.id ) a LEFT JOIN t_user_product b ON a.id = b.product_id AND b.open_id = #{open_id} ) t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.get_time IS NOT NULL AND t.get_time IS NULL

SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT a.id , a.`name` , a.image , a.category_name , a.category1 , a.category2 , a.category3 , a.integration , a.achievement_val , a.finish, a.content, a.type , ( SELECT count(1) FROM t_achievement_relation x WHERE x.achievement_id = a.id ) AS badge_count , DATE_FORMAT(b.create_time , '%Y-%m-%d') AS get_time FROM t_achievement a LEFT JOIN t_user_achievement b ON a.id = b.achievement_id AND b.open_id = #{open_id} ) t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.get_time IS NOT NULL AND t.get_time IS NULL AND t.type = #{type} AND t.category1 = #{category1} AND t.category2 = #{category2} AND t.category3 = #{category3}
